body:
The playground does have timezone.zip embedded in its
fake filesystem.

The reason the program doesn't work is because to interpret
a short time zone time, the time package needs to know
the location, and the playground doesn't have a default
location.

For example, if you specifically parse in a location where
PST make sense, it should work.

http://play.golang.org/p/hdv8x1WYXt
